name: Structured Text Fields for Business Metrics
objective: Change monthly_cost and projected_mrr from Decimal to str to enable AI-consumable context alongside numeric values
unlocks: AI can understand cost breakdowns and revenue assumptions for strategic portfolio analysis
diagram:
┌─────────────────────────┐
│  STRUCTURED TEXT FIELDS │
│      ✅ Complete        │
│                         │
│ Format                  │
│   {value} | {context}   │
│                         │
│ Fields Changed          │
│   • monthly_cost        │
│   • projected_mrr       │
│   Decimal → str         │
│                         │
│ Examples                │
│   "$15/mo | breakdown"  │
│   "$1k/mo target | calc"│
└─────────────────────────┘
